p.note: The SharePoint integration is only available in the Enterprise edition of .

body.p: provides support for browsing and managing SharePoint connections in the Data Source Explorer view and there is also a specialized SharePoint Browser view. You can easily create new resources on the repository, copy and move them using contextual actions or the drag and drop support, or edit and transform the documents in the editor.

There are two types of integrations that are possible:
SharePoint Online - A new implementation that uses the SharePoint REST API v.2 and it supports OAuth credentials (access tokens). If you need authentication, you must use this type of integration.
SharePoint - The older implementation that was implemented using SharePoint Web Services (now deprecated) and it does NOT support OAuth credentials (access tokens).
